modName: Ragged Flagon - Thieves Guild for Power Users
summary: Fit for the new Guild Master, the mod adds a new workspace/living area for the player, with only the essentials for daily living. Now includes optional bard to add into Ragged Flagon.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]Confirmed Clean by TES5Edit/Wrye -- Nexus-Only Exclusive -- Introducing Lisenka the Guild Bard[/b][/color]
[color=red][b]IMPORTANT: Go scroll down below for Upgrade to 2.2 instructions.[/b][/color]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30041-4-1359218090.jpg[/img]
So you\'ve earned the right to become the Master of the Thieves\' Guild, undisputably the best in Tamriel, and you enjoy earning your keep, but after a night\'s worth of nicking goods, why go to sleep in a humble bed?

So because I often frequent the TG headquarters more than I live in Honeyside, and that I earn more money from radiant quests than any other guilds I joined in, it became clear that I decided to make this mod.

[b]NOW NEWLY-REBUILT AND EXPANDED![/b]

[color=cyan][b]Features[/b][/color]
This addition to the Thieves\' Guild lair provides a true home fit for a Guild Master, along with these:
* Double bed
* Kitchenette/bar
* No-respawn safe, closet, chests, bookshelves (only all the barrels do respawn)
* Library
* Smithing equipment
* Enchanting workstation
* Alchemy workstation
* Dining/meeting table
* Small garden
* Swimming pool
* Privacy curtains
* (NEW) Follower quarters
* (NEW) Improved lighting

For Ragged Flagon
* Lisenka the Guild Bard (available only as a separate option in 2.0)

If you have any followers and you use My Home is Your Home, no problem, I\'ve laid in a clean navmesh so that they can do anything there. :)

[color=cyan][b]Compatibility[/b][/color]
Other mods that modify Ragged Flagon -- especially the cell/location -- such as More Ragged Flagon Patrons (More Thieves.esp) may override and disable Lisenka\'s ability to play or sing.

[color=cyan][b]Future Plans[/b][/color]
* None at the moment (see feature list above).

[color=cyan][b]Installation[/b][/color]
Automatic: Use Nexus Mod Manager; in the load list, you may have the option to activate Lisenka the Bard.
Manual: (1) Open the 7Z archive using 7-zip, (2) open the Skyrim/Data folder in Explorer, (3) drag and drop both .ESP files and the Texture folder (this contains the facegen data for Lisenka) into Data. (4) using a mod manager (i.e. Wrye Bash), you may have the option to activate Lisenka the Bard.

[color=cyan][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color]
Automatic: Use Nex Mod Manager but read further for manual uninstallation for full cleanup if needed.
Manual: (1) Retrieve all contents inside chests, cabinets, lockers, racks, and safe, before saving to a new game file (2) Go to Skyrim/Data folder using Explorer (3) find Thieves_Guild_for_PowerUsers_2.esp and Lisenka_the_Bard.esp and delete both, (4) Go to data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/Facetint to delete the Lisenka_the_Bard.esp folder which contains the facegen data.

[color=cyan][b]Upgrading[/b][/color]
(1) Save contents of any containers (chests, cabinets, lockers, racks, and safe) within the guildmaster\'s quarters and create a new game save. (2) Install and overwrite the .ESP files using either NMM or by manual method, copying the contents of the 7zip file into the Data folder.

[color=cyan][b]Upgrading to 2.0 and up[/b][/color]
(1) Save contents of any containers (chests, cabinets, lockers, racks, and safe) within the guildmaster\'s quarters and create a new game save. (2) Delete the old Thieves_Guild_for_PowerUsers.esp and (3) go to data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/Facetint to delete the Thieves_Guild_for_PowerUsers.esp folder (4) Install the new .ESP files using either NMM or by manual method, copying the contents of the 7zip file into the Data folder.

[color=cyan][b]Recommended[/b][/color]
For best results, use the Unofficial Skyrim/Dawnguard/Hearthfire Patches from arthmoor and co.

[b][color=cyan]Other Mods[/color][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34067/]Skaal/Hunter Tropical Outfits for Tropical Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33905/]Peregrine Highwatch Player Home[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32136/]Dragonborn Bayview Player Home[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31639]Dragonborn Aeta Clothing Bugfix[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31518]Dragonborn Simple Furnishing Additions[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28515]Lakeview Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36960]Lakeview Manor Avant Garden for Hearthfire[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26760]SkyRealism -- ENB Evolved Vibrant -- Personal Performance Settings[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30041]Thieves Guild for Power Users[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35359]Windstad Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36776]Heljarchen Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37409]Whiterun Paradise City for Tropical Skyrim[/url]

[color=cyan][b]Credits and Thanks[/b][/color]
* I\'d like to thank DARKF0X127 for providing valuable information on how to add a bard.
* I reserve my thanks and apologies to one of those who pointed out mistakes I made during the development of this mod, and so I applied what I learned from him.

[color=cyan][b]Notices[/b][/color]
This mod is exclusive only to Nexus; cannot be modified or altered or distributed to sites other than Nexus without prior permission from the author.
author: sa547

files.name: Thieves Guild for Power Users
files.changelogHtml:
Added living and workspace area to TG Headquarters, including the usual crafting equipment and storage
Added navmesh
Added two lamps in Ragged Flagon.
Added a few chickens and a stray dog (can be utilized as a companion, if needed).

files.name: Thieves Guild for Power Users with Lisenka the Guild Bard
files.fileName: Thieves Guild for Power Users with Lisenka the Guild Bard-30041-1-25.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Added new bard (Lisenka) to Ragged Flagon
Did some UDR cleaning using Wrye and TES5edit
Minor cosmetic changes to GM quarters

files.name: Thieves Guild for Power Users with Lisenka the Guild Bard
files.fileName: Thieves Guild for Power Users with Lisenka the Guild Bard-30041-2-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Full rebuild to ensure cleanliness
Lisenka is now available as a separate option and can be activated in the load list.

files.name: Thieves Guild for Power Users
files.changelogHtml:
Included new follower quarters for My Home is Your Home users for up to eight followers.
Revised passageway for Skyrim Project Optimization
Improved lighting system for better visibility
Mod package no longer includes Lisenka the Bard.
